definition: mini (as in mini-skirt or Mini Cooper) (loanword)
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])

sentences.english: Avoid mini skirts, too much make up, and excessive jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 避免迷你裙，化太浓的妆和过多的首饰。

sentences.english: twenty years of age, wore tight mini skirts and low cut blouses. She would
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢穿紧身的低胸t_shirt以及迷你短裙。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a link builder for a brazilian mini games site.
sentences.chinese: 我正在寻找一个为巴西迷你游戏网站链接建设者。

sentences.english: Put in the stack, and grab cakes served in the three new mini games.
sentences.chinese: 放在堆栈，抢蛋糕服务三个新的迷你游戏。

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: What is this charge for? I didn't use the mini-bar.
sentences.chinese: 这笔费用是什么？我没有使用过房间的迷你吧。

sentences.english: In the market for a home-made guitar pick or a mini canvas brooch?
sentences.chinese: 你正在搜寻自制吉他拨片或迷你帆布胸针？

sentences.english: Watching those blocky minifigures walk around their sets will make you smile.
sentences.chinese: 看那些块状迷你人偶在布景中走来走去会让你发笑。

sentences.english: And the fish had to be added with a specially made miniature fish net.
sentences.chinese: 而且还有为投放鱼专门制造的迷你鱼网。

sentences.english: Mini-skirts were in fashion last summer.
This little trick is like a mini reflexology session.
sentences.chinese: 这项小把戏就像是种迷你反射疗法。

sentences.english: Lydia always comes to work in a—mini-skirt and high heels.
sentences.chinese: 莉蒂雅总是穿着性感迷你裙和高跟鞋来上班。

sentences.english: My dad was very much pleased with my greeting card.
sentences.chinese: 现在的很多迷你书印得像明信片一样漂亮。

sentences.english: You can make the profiles of your minis as complex or simple as you like.
sentences.chinese: 您可以利用复杂或简单，你喜欢你的迷你的概况。

sentences.english: Kakhaber Kaladze joined the team in the mini game.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉泽也加入了迷你比赛之中。
